# TOC

## analyses
  
  *Scripts for reading in aligned counts, normalization, and prediction

## counts

  *Placehodler directory for transcript count files returned from Salmon or other aligners 
  
## rawreads
  
  *Includes markdown for proccessing raw count data to salmon counts
  
  *Raw sequencing files returned from GSL
  
## references

  *Transcriptome reference data needed for software
  
## resources

  *Scripts for gathering experimental data, phenotypes, pedigree, index information
  
## snps
  
  *Includes markdown for proccessing snp data
  
  *SNP VCF files
  
## software

  *Version of software used for data analysis
  
## trimmedfiltreads

  *Read fastq files returned after filtering and trimming
